title: Team-Based Science Learning Relationship-Building Strategies for Multicultural Background Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Fundamental Scientific Theories and Research Methodologies, and Elementary Awareness of Multicultural Environments
context.additional_context: An asynchronous online learning environment requiring team collaboration and relationship analysis in a smartphone-based limited-technology setting.

learning_goals: Learners can maintain effective learning relationships within multicultural teams with over 80% participation rate for 14 weeks.
Learners can evaluate intra-/inter-team collaboration relationships as visual maps using social network analysis at least twice.
Learners can develop communication strategies considering cultural differences and incorporate three or more cultural elements in team project presentations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
